name: Instead (itch)
description:
We very much appreciate constructive criticism!
If you're willing to share your thoughts, please complete the short survey here: https://forms.gle/eGvQGCYwmB5RM56q9

Overview: This is a small game designed to help those struggling with self-harm. Players can visit the Knitter to help focus on what they are feeling at that moment. From there, they can speak to one of several other characters who will suggest alternatives to self-harming, such as exercising, dancing, calling a friend, and more. This was created for the 2022 May Day Mental Health Game Jam.

Technical Information: Created in Unity, Procreate, Photoshop, and Audacity. 

Faculty Lead: Heather Freeman (Art & Art History)

Credits: All work by Heather Freeman, audio mixed from CC-0 sounds from Freesound.org.
